title: (x) Modern serif used for Dapper.net logo - Elephant aka Big Figgins {Paul Knegten}
content:
The font is the in the logo foe dapper.net and I NEED IT BAAAAD!! :D

Trying to figure out where I can find the font. I have searched for awhile on google to no avail.

[http://www.dapper.net/](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202092031/http:/www.dapper.net/)
author: kermitforney

comments.content: YEEEEESS!!! Thank you sooo much FontGrube!!

Nope, it's Elephant. :)

Enjoy!

Paul Knegten  
Head of Marketing  
Dapper.net

Hi Paul,  
thanks for the clarification.  
 [Matthew Carter](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202092031/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Matthew%2520Carter)â€™s [Elephant](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202092031/http:/www.identifont.com/show?1W09) has been renamed to [Big Figgins](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202092031/http:/designmuseum.org/__entry/4986?style=design_image_popup).  
F
